control.description-key: List view control allows you to enter the text in list view and You can delete the text as per your choice in Single Click. It is user friendly with modern UI.

property.name: ButtonName
property.description-key: Enter the Button Name. Try to make it short means Single word button Name for Better UI.

property.name: ButtonColor
property.description-key: Enter the Button color as per your requirement. It should be in Color Hex Format.

property.name: TextSeparator
property.description-key: As storing value in single field. Need to separete the text.

property.name: DeleteImage
property.description-key: Link of Delete Icon for each comment we have entered.

property.name: VerticalScrollBar
property.description-key: If you want vertical scroll bar after some height then enter specific height with rem property Example 20rem, 22rem, 30rem, etc. If you dont want it just enter none value as input.
